source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: The Surah takes its name from the word wal-mursalat in the first verse.
text:
The Surah takes its name from the word wal-mursalat in the first verse.

Period of Revelation

Its subject matter bears full evidence that it was revealed in the earliest period at Makkah. If this Surah is read together with the two Surahs preceding it, namely Al-Qiyamah and Ad-Dahr, and the two Surahs following it, namely An-Naba and An-Naziat, it becomes obvious that all these Surahs are the Revelations of the same period, and they deal with one and the same theme, which has been impressed on the people of Makkah in different ways.

Theme and Subject Matter

Its theme is to affirm the Resurrection and Hereafter and to warn the people of the consequences which will ultimately follow the denial and the affirmation of these truths.

In the first seven verses, the system of winds has been presented as an evidence of the truth that the Resurrection which is being foretold by the Qur'an and the Prophet Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) must come to pass. The reasoning is that the power of All-Mighty Allah Who established this wonderful system on the earth, cannot be helpless in bringing about the Resurrection, and the express wisdom which underlies this system bears full evidence that the Hereafter must appear, for no act of an All-Wise Creator can be vain and purposeless, and if there was no Hereafter, it would mean that the whole of one's life was useless and absurd.

The people of Makkah repeatedly asked, "Bring about the Resurrection with which you threaten us; only then shall we believe in it."In vv. 8-15, their demand has been answered, saying:"Resurrection is no sport or fun so that whenever a jester should ask for it, it should be brought forth immediately. It is indeed the Day of Judgment to settle the account of all mankind and of all its individuals. For it Allah has fixed a specific time it will take place at its own time, and when it takes place with all its dreads and horrors, it will confound those who are demanding it for fun today. Then their cases will be decided only on the evidence of those Messengers whom these deniers of the truth are repudiating with impunity. Then they will themselves realize how they themselves are responsible for their dooms

In vv. 16-28 arguments have been given continuously for the occurrence and necessity of the Resurrection and Hereafter. In these it has been stated that man's own history, his own birth, and the structure of the earth on which he lives, bear the testimony that the coming of Resurrection and the establishment of the Hereafter are possible as well as the demand of Allah Almighty's wisdom. History tells us that the nations which denied the Hereafter ultimately became corrupted and met with destruction. This means that the Hereafter is a truth which if denied and contradicted by a nation by its conduct and attitude, will cause it to meet the same doom, which is met by a blind man who bushes headlong into an approaching train. And it also means that in the kingdom of the universe only physical laws are not at work but a moral law also is working in it, under which in this very world the process of retribution is operating. But since in the present life of the world retribution is not
taking place in its complete and perfect form, the moral law of the universe necessarily demands that there should come a time when it should take its full course and all those good works and evil deeds, which could not be rewarded here, or which escaped their due punishment should be fully rewarded and punished. For this it is inevitable that there should be a second life after death. If man only considers how he takes his birth in the world, his intellect, provided it is sound intellect, cannot deny that for the God Who began his creation from an insignificant sperm drop and developed him into a perfect man, it certainly possible to create the same man once again. After death the particles of man's body do not disappear but continue to exist on the same earth on which he lived his whole life. It is from the resources and treasures of this very earth that he is made and nourished and then into the same treasures of the earth he is deposited. The God who caused him to emerge from
the treasures of the earth, in the first instance, can also cause him to re-emerge from the same treasures after he has been restored to them at death. If one only considers the powers of Allah, one cannot deny that He can do this; and if one considers the wisdom of Allah, one also cannot deny that it is certainly the very demand of His wisdom to call man to account for the right and wrong use of the powers that He has granted him on the earth; it would rather be against wisdom to let him off without rendering an account.

Then, in vv. 28-40, the fate of the deniers of the Hereafter has been depicted, and in vv. 41-45 of those who affirming faith in it in their worldly life, endeavored to improve their Hereafter, and abstained from the evils of disbelief and thought, morality and deed, conduct and character which might be helpful in man's worldly life, but are certainly ruinous for his life hereafter.

In the end, the deniers of the Hereafter and those who turn away from God-worship, have been warned as if to say: "Enjoy your short-lived worldly pleasure as you may, but your end will ultimately be disastrous." The discourse concludes with the assertion that the one who fails to obtain guidance from Book like the Qur'an, can have no ether source in the world to afford him Guidance.
description: The surah that opens with the oath of the Divine One swearing by the Emissaries as those sent forth in succession. It takes its name from the “emissaries” (mursalāt) mentioned in verse 1. The surah describes the Day of Decision: its inevitability, arguments for its coming, and the events that will presage the Judgement, as well as the fates of believers and disbelievers.The surah is also known as: (Winds) Sent Forth, The Loosed Ones, Those Sent Forth, Those Sent Forth in Succession, Those That Are Sent Forth.

Efendi Nahi.verse 77:1: Betohem në ata (engjëjt) që sjellin të mira,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:2: e betohem në ata që shpejtojnë si stuhia;
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:3: dhe betohem në ata që sjellin shpalljet e pastaj dallojnë (të mirën nga e keqja), -
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:7: me të vërtetë, ajo ë ju premtohet, do të bëhet!
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:11: dhe kur të dërguarit (pejgamberët) do të caktojnë kohën (e tubimit).
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:12: (Do të thuhet): “Deri në cilën ditë është shtyer afati?” –
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:14: E, a e di ti se ç’është Dita e vendimit?
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:16: A nuk i kemi zhdukur popujt e lashtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:17: e pas tyre edhe të tjerët?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:18: Në këtë mënyrë do të veprojmë me të gjithë fajtorët!
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:20: A nuk ju kemi krijuar (Ne) nga një pikë uji të pakonsiderueshëm,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:21: të cilin e kemi vendosur në vend të sigurtë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:23: E tillë është fuqia Jonë; e sa të fuqishëm jemi Ne! –
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:25: A nuk e bëmë Ne Tokën vendtubimi
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:26: të të gjallëve dhe të të vdekurëve
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:27: dhe në të kemi vendosur male të larta, dhe a nuk ju dhamë Ne juve të pini ujë të ëmbël (të pijes)? –
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:29: (Ju thuhet): “Shkoni kah ajo (dënimi), të cilën ju e keni konsideruar gënjeshtër,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:30: shkoni kah tymi i ndarë në tri fjollë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:31: i cili nuk të freskon dhe nga flaka nuk shpëton.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:32: Ai hedh shkëndija si rrënjët e lisit të madh,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:35: Kjo është ajo ditë kur ata nuk mund të flasin
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:36: dhe nuk jepet leje për ta, për t’u arsyetuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:38: (Ju thuhet): Kjo është Dita e gjykimit, në të cilën juv edhe popujt e lashtë i kemi tubuar,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:39: e nëse dispononi me ndonjë dinakëri, përdoreni kundër Meje! –
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:41: Ata që ruhen nga të kundërshtuarit Perëndinë, do të jenë në mesin e burimeve dhe të hijeve,
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:42: dhe midis pemëve çfarë i dëshirojnë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:43: (Ju thuhet): “Hani e pini, e ju bëftë mirë! (Shpërblim) për atë që keni punuar”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:44: Kështu Na i shpërblejmë ata, që bëjnë vepra të mira.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:46: (Ju thuhet jobesimtarëve): “Hani dhe kënaquni, por për pak kohë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:48: Por, kur ju thuhet atyre (në këtë jetë): “Përuluni ndaj Perëndisë (falni namazin)!” – ata nuk përulen.
Efendi Nahi.verse 77:50: E, në çfarë libri tjetër do të besojnë, pas Kur’anit?! përgënjeshtarët!

null.verse 77:1: And olsun bir-birinin ardınca göndərilənlərə (mələklərə, peyğəmbərlərə, yaxud küləklərə);
null.verse 77:2: And olsun şiddətlə əsənlərə (və ya yel kimi tez gedənlərə);
null.verse 77:3: And olsun (Allahın ayələrini, kitablarını və əmrlərini) yayanlara;
null.verse 77:4: And olsun (haqla batili) ayıranlara;
null.verse 77:6: (Mö'minlər tövbə edib) üzr diləmək və ya (kafirləri) qorxutmaq üçün (olan vəhyi çatdıranlara) ki,
null.verse 77:7: Sizə və'd edilən (qiyamət) mütləq vaqe olacaqdır!
null.verse 77:10: Dağlar parça-parça olub dağılacağı (toz kimi havada uçacağı);
null.verse 77:11: Peyğəmbərlərə (öz ümmətlərinə şahidlik etmək üçün bir qədər) möhlət veriləcəyi zaman,
null.verse 77:12: (Belə soruşulacaqdır: ) "(Bunlara) hansı günə qədər möhlət verilmişdir?"
null.verse 77:13: (Həmin suala cavab olaraq deyiləcəkdir: ) "(Haqla batili) ayırd ediləcəyi günə qədər!"
null.verse 77:14: Nə bilirsən (haradan bilirsən) ki, nədir o ayırd etmə günü?!
null.verse 77:15: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:16: Məgər Biz əvvəlkiləri (keçmiş kafir ümmətləri) məhv etmədikmi?!
null.verse 77:17: Sonra axırda gələnləri (Məkkə müşriklərini) də onlara qatacağıq.
null.verse 77:18: Biz günahkarlarla belə rəftar edirik.
null.verse 77:19: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:20: Məgər sizi bir qətrə zəif (dəyərsiz) sudan (nütfədən) yaratmadıqmı?!
null.verse 77:21: Biz onu möhkəm bir yerdə (ana bətnində) saxladıq,
null.verse 77:23: Biz (nütfədən insan yaratmağa) qadir olduq.
null.verse 77:24: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:25: Məgər Biz yeri məskən etmədikmi
null.verse 77:26: Həm dirilərə, həm də ölülərə?! (Yerin altında ölülər yatar, üstündə dirilər gəzib-dolanar).
null.verse 77:27: Biz orada möhkəm durmuş uca dağlar yaratdıq və sizə şirin su içirtdik.
null.verse 77:28: O gün vay halına (bu ne'mətləri) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:29: (O gün kafirlərə belə deyiləcəkdir: ) "Girin (dünyada) yalan hesab etdiyiniz (cəhənnəm əzabının) içinə!
null.verse 77:30: Girin (cəhənnəm tüstüsünün) üç qola ayrılmış kölgəsinə!"
null.verse 77:31: O (sizə) nə kölgəlik olar, nə də (sizi) alovdan qoruyar.
null.verse 77:32: O (hər biri) bir saray boyda qığılcımlar saçar.
null.verse 77:33: O (qığılcımlar), sanki sarı dəvə sürükləridir.
null.verse 77:34: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:35: Bu elə bir gündür ki, (qiyaməti yalan sayanlar) danışa bilməzlər.
null.verse 77:36: Onlara üzr istəməyə izin də verilməz.
null.verse 77:37: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:38: Bu sizi də, (sizdən) əvvəlkiləri də bir yerə topladığımız (haqla batili) ayırd etmə günüdür!
null.verse 77:39: (Dünyada etdiyiniz kimi, bu günün əzabından qurtarmaq üçün) bir hiyləniz varsa, Mənə qarşı qurun görək!
null.verse 77:40: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:41: Həqiqətən, (o gün) müttəqilər kölgəliklərdə və çeşmələr başında,
null.verse 77:42: İstədikləri meyvə içində olacaqlar!
null.verse 77:43: (Onlara belə deyiləcəkdir: ) "(Dünyada) etdiyiniz (yaxşı) əməllərə görə nuşcanlıqla yeyin-için!
null.verse 77:44: Biz yaxşı əməl sahiblərini belə mükafatlandırırıq!"
null.verse 77:45: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:46: (Siz ey kafirlər!) Yeyin və (dünyada) bir az kef çəkin.
null.verse 77:47: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:48: Onlara: "Namaz qılın!" - deyildiyi zaman namaz qılmazlar!
null.verse 77:49: O gün vay halına (qiyaməti) yalan sayanların!
null.verse 77:50: (Bu kafirlər) ona da (Qur'ana da) inanmayandan sonra daha hansı kəlama inanacaqlar?!

null.verse 77:1: Tako mi onih koji se jedan za drugim šalju
null.verse 77:3: i onih koji objavljuju
null.verse 77:4: pa razdvajaju,
null.verse 77:6: opravdanje ili opomenu -
null.verse 77:7: sigurno će biti ono čime vam se prijeti!
null.verse 77:10: i kada se planine u prah zdrobe
null.verse 77:11: i kada se poslanici u određeno vrijeme skupe.
null.verse 77:12: Do kojeg dana je to odloženo? -
null.verse 77:14: A znaš li ti šta je Dan sudnji? -
null.verse 77:15: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:16: Zar Mi nismo drevne narode uništili
null.verse 77:17: i poslije njih i one koji su za njima dolazili?!
null.verse 77:18: Isto tako ćemo sa svim grješnicima postupati!
null.verse 77:19: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:20: Zar vas od neznatne tekućine ne stvaramo,
null.verse 77:21: koju na pouzdano mjesto stavljamo
null.verse 77:23: Takva je Naša moć; a kako smo Mi samo moćni! -
null.verse 77:24: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:25: Zar Mi nismo učinili Zemlju sabiralištem
null.verse 77:27: i na njoj nepomične visoke planine postavili, i zar vam Mi ne dajemo da slatku vodu pijete?
null.verse 77:28: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:29: Idite prema onome što ste neistinom smatrali,
null.verse 77:30: idite prema dimu u tri plama razdvojenom,
null.verse 77:31: koji hlada neće davati i koji od plamena neće zaklanjati.
null.verse 77:32: On će kao kule bacati iskre
null.verse 77:33: kao da su kamile riđe.
null.verse 77:34: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:35: Ovo je dan u kome oni neće ni prozboriti
null.verse 77:36: i pravdanje im neće dozvoljeno biti.
null.verse 77:37: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:38: Ovo je Dan sudnji, i vas i narode drevne ćemo sakupiti,
null.verse 77:39: pa ako se lukavstvom kakvim budete znali poslužiti, dovijte se protiv Mene!
null.verse 77:40: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:41: Oni koji su se Allaha bojali biće među izvorima, u gustim baščama
null.verse 77:42: i među voćem koje budu željeli.
null.verse 77:43: Jedite i pijte, prijatno neka vam je! - za ono što ste radili
null.verse 77:44: Tako ćemo Mi one koji čine dobra djela nagraditi.
null.verse 77:45: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:46: Jedite i naslađujte se, ali zakratko! - vi ste, zaista, grješnici!
null.verse 77:47: Teško toga dana poricateljima! -
null.verse 77:48: jer kad im se govorilo: "Budite prema Allahu ponizni!" - oni to nisu htjeli biti,
null.verse 77:49: Teško toga dana poricateljima!
null.verse 77:50: Pa u koji će govor, ako ne u Kur’an, vjerovati?! poricateljima!

null.verse 77:1: কল্যাণের জন্যে প্রেরিত বায়ুর শপথ,
null.verse 77:3: মেঘবিস্তৃতকারী বায়ুর শপথ
null.verse 77:4: মেঘপুঞ্জ বিতরণকারী বায়ুর শপথ এবং
null.verse 77:6: ওযর-আপত্তির অবকাশ না রাখার জন্যে অথবা সতর্ক করার জন্যে।
null.verse 77:7: নিশ্চয়ই তোমাদেরকে প্রদত্ত ওয়াদা বাস্তবায়িত হবে।
null.verse 77:10: যখন পর্বতমালাকে উড়িয়ে দেয়া হবে এবং
null.verse 77:11: যখন রসূলগণের একত্রিত হওয়ার সময় নিরূপিত হবে,
null.verse 77:12: এসব বিষয় কোন দিবসের জন্যে স্থগিত রাখা হয়েছে?
null.verse 77:14: আপনি জানেন বিচার দিবস কি?
null.verse 77:15: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:16: আমি কি পূর্ববর্তীদেরকে ধ্বংস করিনি?
null.verse 77:17: অতঃপর তাদের পশ্চাতে প্রেরণ করব পরবর্তীদেরকে।
null.verse 77:18: অপরাধীদের সাথে আমি এরূপই করে থাকি।
null.verse 77:19: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:20: আমি কি তোমাদেরকে তুচ্ছ পানি থেকে সৃষ্টি করিনি?
null.verse 77:21: অতঃপর আমি তা রেখেছি এক সংরক্ষিত আধারে,
null.verse 77:23: অতঃপর আমি পরিমিত আকারে সৃষ্টি করেছি, আমি কত সক্ষম স্রষ্টা?
null.verse 77:24: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:25: আমি কি পৃথিবীকে সৃষ্টি করিনি ধারণকারিণীরূপে,
null.verse 77:27: আমি তাতে স্থাপন করেছি মজবুত সুউচ্চ পর্বতমালা এবং পান করিয়েছি তোমাদেরকে তৃষ্ণা নিবারণকারী সুপেয় পানি।
null.verse 77:28: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:29: চল তোমরা তারই দিকে, যাকে তোমরা মিথ্যা বলতে।
null.verse 77:30: চল তোমরা তিন কুন্ডলীবিশিষ্ট ছায়ার দিকে,
null.verse 77:31: যে ছায়া সুনিবিড় নয় এবং অগ্নির উত্তাপ থেকে রক্ষা করে না।
null.verse 77:32: এটা অট্টালিকা সদৃশ বৃহৎ স্ফুলিংগ নিক্ষেপ করবে।
null.verse 77:33: যেন সে পীতবর্ণ উষ্ট্রশ্রেণী।
null.verse 77:34: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:35: এটা এমন দিন, যেদিন কেউ কথা বলবে না।
null.verse 77:36: এবং কাউকে তওবা করার অনুমতি দেয়া হবে না।
null.verse 77:37: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:38: এটা বিচার দিবস, আমি তোমাদেরকে এবং তোমাদের পূর্ববর্তীদেরকে একত্রিত করেছি।
null.verse 77:39: অতএব, তোমাদের কোন অপকৌশল থাকলে তা প্রয়োগ কর আমার কাছে।
null.verse 77:40: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:41: নিশ্চয় খোদাভীরুরা থাকবে ছায়ায় এবং প্রস্রবণসমূহে-
null.verse 77:42: এবং তাদের বাঞ্ছিত ফল-মূলের মধ্যে।
null.verse 77:43: বলা হবেঃ তোমরা যা করতে তার বিনিময়ে তৃপ্তির সাথে পানাহার কর।
null.verse 77:44: এভাবেই আমি সৎকর্মশীলদেরকে পুরস্কৃত করে থাকি।
null.verse 77:45: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:46: কাফেরগণ, তোমরা কিছুদিন খেয়ে নাও এবং ভোগ করে নাও। তোমরা তো অপরাধী।
null.verse 77:47: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:48: যখন তাদেরকে বলা হয়, নত হও, তখন তারা নত হয় না।
null.verse 77:49: সেদিন মিথ্যারোপকারীদের দুর্ভোগ হবে।
null.verse 77:50: এখন কোন কথায় তারা এরপর বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করবে? হবে।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:7: онова, което ви е обещано, ще се сбъдне.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:11: и когато за пратениците бъде определено време
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:14: А ти откъде да знаеш какво е Денят на разделението?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:15: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:17: Към тях ще добавим и сетните.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:19: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:20: Не ви ли сътворихме Ние от нищожна вода?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:21: И я сложихме на сигурно място
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:24: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:25: Не сторихме ли земята да събере
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:27: и положихме върху нея непоклатими високи планини, и ви дадохме за пиене прясна вода.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:28: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:30: Тръгнете към сянката [на Ада] с три разклонения,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:31: която не носи прохлада и не избавя от пламъците!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:34: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:35: Това е Денят, в който не ще проговорят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:36: И не ще им бъде позволено да се оправдават.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:37: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:39: И ако имате коварство, коварствайте срещу Мен!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:40: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:41: Богобоязливите ще бъдат сред сенки и извори,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:43: Яжте и пийте със здраве за онова, което сте вършили!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:45: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:46: Яжте [на земята] и се наслаждавайте за кратко! Вие сте престъпници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:47: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:48: И когато им се каже: Поклонете се!, не се покланят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 77:49: Горко в този Ден за отричащите!

null.verse 77:1: 誓以奉派傳達佳音，
null.verse 77:3: 誓以傳播各物，
null.verse 77:4: 而使之分散，
null.verse 77:6: 誓以示原諒或警告者，
null.verse 77:7: 警告你們的事，是必定發生的。
null.verse 77:10: 當山巒飛揚的時候，
null.verse 77:11: 當眾使者被定期召集的時候，
null.verse 77:12: 期限在哪日呢？
null.verse 77:14: 你怎能知道判決之日，是什麼？
null.verse 77:15: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們。
null.verse 77:16: 難道我沒有毀滅先民嗎？
null.verse 77:17: 然後，我使後民隨他們而消滅。
null.verse 77:18: 我將這樣處治犯罪的人。
null.verse 77:19: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們。
null.verse 77:20: 難道我沒有用薄弱的精液創造你們嗎？
null.verse 77:21: 我把它放在一個堅固的安息之所，
null.verse 77:23: 我曾判定，我是善於判定的。
null.verse 77:24: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們。
null.verse 77:25: 難道我沒有使大地成為包羅
null.verse 77:27: 我曾在大地上，安置許多崇高的山巒。我曾賞賜你們甘美的飲料。
null.verse 77:28: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:29: 「你們去享受你們所否認的刑罰吧！
null.verse 77:30: 你們去享受有三個權的蔭影吧！」
null.verse 77:31: 那蔭影不是陰涼的，不能遮擋火焰的熱浪。
null.verse 77:32: 那火焰噴射出宮殿般的火星，
null.verse 77:33: 好像黧黑的駱駝一樣。
null.verse 77:34: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:35: 這是他們不得發言之日。
null.verse 77:36: 他們不蒙許可，故不能道歉。
null.verse 77:37: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:38: 這是判決之日，我把你們和先民集合在一處。
null.verse 77:39: 如果你們有什麼計謀，你們可對我用計。
null.verse 77:40: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:41: 敬畏的人們，必定在樹蔭之下，清泉之濱，
null.verse 77:42: 享受他們愛吃的水果，
null.verse 77:43: 將對他們說：「你們曾經行善，故你們痛快地飲食吧！」
null.verse 77:44: 我必定這樣報酬行善的人們。
null.verse 77:45: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們。
null.verse 77:46: 「你們暫時吃喝享受吧！你們確是犯罪的人。」
null.verse 77:47: 在那日，傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:48: 有人對他們說：「你們當鞠躬。」他們不肯鞠躬。
null.verse 77:49: 傷哉否認真理的人們！
null.verse 77:50: 除《古蘭經》外，他們要信仰什麼文辭呢？ 傷哉否認真理的人們！

null.verse 77:1: Při postupně vysílaných,
null.verse 77:3: široce rozevírajících,
null.verse 77:4: ostře rozlišujících
null.verse 77:6: ať pro omluvu či varování -
null.verse 77:7: to, co vám je slíbeno nezvratně se přihodí!
null.verse 77:10: až hory rozprášeny budou,
null.verse 77:11: až čas poslům bude stanoven -
null.verse 77:12: ke kterému dni odklad bude udělen?
null.verse 77:14: Víš ty vůbec, co je to den rozhodnutí?
null.verse 77:15: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:16: Což jsme již předchozí nezahubili
null.verse 77:17: a nedali je následovat jinými?
null.verse 77:18: Takto my budeme jednat s hříšnými!
null.verse 77:19: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:20: Což jsme vás nestvořili z tekutiny nicotné,
null.verse 77:21: již vložili jsme na místo bezpečné
null.verse 77:23: Tak určili jsme, a jak výtečnými jsme určovateli!
null.verse 77:24: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:25: Což jsme neučinili zem shromaždištěm
null.verse 77:27: A na ni jsme pevně zapuštěné a vysoko se pnoucí vztyčili a vodou čerstvou jsme vás napojili.
null.verse 77:28: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:29: Jděte si k tomu, co lživým jste nazvali,
null.verse 77:30: jděte si ke stínu se třemi větvemi,
null.verse 77:31: nepříliš stinnému, jenž nechrání proti plameni,
null.verse 77:32: který jiskry jak polena veliká vrhá,
null.verse 77:33: žlutým velbloudům podobná!
null.verse 77:34: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:35: To bude den, v němž zavržení ani nepromluví,
null.verse 77:36: ani dovoleno jim nebude, aby vznesli své omluvy.
null.verse 77:37: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:38: To bude den rozhodnutí, a shromáždíme vás i předchozí;
null.verse 77:39: a vládnete-li lstí nějakou, pak pokuste se Mne přelstít!
null.verse 77:40: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:41: Bohabojní ve stínu a u pramenů budou dlít
null.verse 77:42: a ovoce, po němž touží, na dosah ruky mít.
null.verse 77:43: Jezte a pijte v bezpečí v odměnu za to, co jste konali!
null.verse 77:44: Takto my věru odměňujeme ty, kdož dobré činili.
null.verse 77:45: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:46: A vy, nevěřící, jezte a užívejte si ještě krátce, vždyť vy věru jste hříšníci!
null.verse 77:47: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:48: A když je jim řečeno "Na zem padejte!", nepadají.
null.verse 77:49: Běda v ten den těm, kdož za lež jej prohlásili!
null.verse 77:50: V jaké zvěstování by po tomto ještě mohli uvěřit? prohlásili!

null.verse 77:1: Bij de met goedheid gezondenen.
null.verse 77:3: En bij hen, die heinde en ver verspreiden.
null.verse 77:4: En bij hen die goed onderscheiden.
null.verse 77:5: En bij hen die de vermaning toedienen,
null.verse 77:6: Om tot verontschuldiging te brengen en te waarschuwen.
null.verse 77:7: Voorwaar, hetgeen u is beloofd moet gebeuren.
null.verse 77:8: Dus, als de sterren verduisterd zullen zijn.
null.verse 77:9: En als de hemelen geopend zullen worden.
null.verse 77:10: En als de bergen verstrooid zullen zijn.
null.verse 77:11: En als de gezanten verzameld zullen worden.
null.verse 77:12: Tot welke Dag is dit einde uitgesteld?
null.verse 77:14: En wat weet gij ervan wat de Dag der beslissing is?
null.verse 77:15: Wee op die Dag, degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:16: Hebben Wij de vroegere (ongelovigen) niet vernietigd?
null.verse 77:17: Wij zullen daarom die van latere tijden hen doen volgen.
null.verse 77:18: Zo behandelen Wij de schuldigen.
null.verse 77:19: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen!
null.verse 77:20: Schiepen Wij u niet uit een kleine levenskiem
null.verse 77:21: Die Wij op een veilige plaats bewaarden.
null.verse 77:23: Zo hebben Wij bepaald.
null.verse 77:24: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen!
null.verse 77:25: Hebben Wij de aarde niet gemaakt om
null.verse 77:26: De levenden en de doden te kunnen bevatten?
null.verse 77:27: En hebben Wij er geen hoge bergen op geplaatst en u zoet (zuiver) watergegeven om te drinken.
null.verse 77:28: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:29: Men zal zeggen: "Gaat naar (de straf) welke gij loochendet.
null.verse 77:30: Begeeft u tot een schaduw van drie takken,
null.verse 77:31: Die geen koelte geeft, noch beschermt tegen de vlam.
null.verse 77:32: Ziet! Het (Vuur der hel) gooit vonken op als kastelen.
null.verse 77:33: Alsof zij kamelen van een gele kleur waren.
null.verse 77:34: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen!
null.verse 77:35: Dit is een Dag waarop zij (de schuldigen) niet mogen spreken,
null.verse 77:36: Noch zal hun worden toegestaan verontschuldigingen aan te bieden.
null.verse 77:37: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:38: Dit is de Dag der beslissing; Wij hebben u en degenen die vroeger leefden bijeengebracht.
null.verse 77:39: Indien gij nu enig plan hebt gebruikt het dan tegen Mij.
null.verse 77:40: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen!
null.verse 77:41: De godvruchtigen zullen te midden van schaduwen en bronnen wonen,
null.verse 77:42: En fruit ontvangen, zoals zij zich mogen wensen.
null.verse 77:43: (Men zal zeggen): "Eet en drinkt met smaak als beloning voor hetgeen gij placht te doen.
null.verse 77:44: Voorwaar, zo belonen Wij degenen die goed doen.
null.verse 77:45: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:46: "Eet en vermaakt u een poosje (in dit leven).
null.verse 77:47: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:48: En als er tot hen wordt gezegd: "Buigt u neder!" dan buigen zij zich niet.
null.verse 77:49: Wee op die Dag degenen die loochenen.
null.verse 77:50: In welk woord buiten dit zullen zij dan geloven? loochenen.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:1: By the emissary winds, (sent) one after another
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:3: By those which cause earth’s vegetation to revive;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:4: By those who winnow with a winnowing,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:5: By those who bring down the Reminder,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:7: Surely that which ye are promised will befall.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:8: So when the stars are put out,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:9: And when the sky is riven asunder,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:10: And when the mountains are blown away,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:11: And when the messengers are brought unto their time appointed -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:12: For what day is the time appointed ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:14: And what will convey unto thee what the Day of Decision is! -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:15: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:16: Destroyed We not the former folk,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:17: Then caused the latter folk to follow after ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:18: Thus deal We ever with the guilty.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:19: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:20: Did We not create you from a base fluid
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:21: Which We laid up in a safe abode
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:24: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:25: Have We not made the earth a receptacle
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:26: Both for the living and the dead,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:27: And placed therein high mountains and given you to drink sweet water therein ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:28: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:29: (It will be said unto them:) Depart unto that (doom) which ye used to deny;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:30: Depart unto the shadow falling threefold,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:31: (Which yet is) no relief nor shelter from the flame.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:32: Lo! it throweth up sparks like the castles,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:33: (Or) as it might be camels of bright yellow hue.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:34: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:35: This is a day wherein they speak not,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:36: Nor are they suffered to put forth excuses.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:37: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:38: This is the Day of Decision, We have brought you and the men of old together.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:39: If now ye have any wit, outwit Me.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:40: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:41: Lo! those who kept their duty are amid shade and fountains,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:42: And fruits such as they desire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:43: (Unto them it is said:) Eat, drink and welcome, O ye blessed, in return for what ye did.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:44: Thus do We reward the good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:45: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:46: Eat and take your ease (on earth) a little.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:47: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:48: When it is said unto them: Bow down, they bow not down!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:49: Woe unto the repudiators on that day!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 77:50: In what statement, after this, will they believe ? day!

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:1: By the (Winds) sent forth one after another (to man’s profit);
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:2: Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:4: Then separate them, one from another,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:6: Whether of Justification or of Warning;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:7: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:8: Then when the stars become dim;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:9: When the heaven is cleft asunder;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:10: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:11: And when the apostles are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:12: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:13: For the Day of Sorting out.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:14: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:15: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:16: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:17: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:18: Thus do We deal with men of sin.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:19: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:20: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable?-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:21: The which We placed in a place of rest, firmly fixed,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:22: For a period (of gestation), determined (according to need)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:23: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:24: Ah woe, that Day! to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:25: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:27: And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:28: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:29: (It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:30: "Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:31: "(Which yields) no shade of coolness, and is of no use against the fierce Blaze.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:32: "Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:33: "As if there were (a string of) yellow camels (marching swiftly).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:34: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:35: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:36: Nor will it be open to them to put forth pleas.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:37: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:38: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:39: Now, if ye have a trick (or plot), use it against Me!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:40: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:41: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:42: And (they shall have) fruits,- all they desire.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:43: "Eat ye and drink ye to your heart’s content: for that ye worked (Righteousness).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:44: Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 77:45: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:1: By the soft blowing, pleasant breezes which blow in succession,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:2: Then by the violent winds which blow with fierce gusts,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:3: And by those which spread the clouds all around,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:4: Then by those which split (them) apart and break them off,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:5: Then by those which bring direction and guidance,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:6: To accomplish the argument or to warn,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:7: Surely, the promise (of the Last Day) which is being given to you will be certainly fulfilled.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:8: Then when the light of the stars will be extinguished,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:9: And when the heavenly universe will be split open,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:10: And when the mountains will be (broken down to dust) and blown off,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:11: And when the Messengers will be brought together at the appointed time (to bear witness to their respective communities),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:12: Well, for what Day is the term (of all the affairs) appointed?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:14: And who has told you what the Day of Judgment is?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:15: Woe (and devastation) to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:16: Did We not destroy the people (who denied) before?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:17: Then We also cause the later ones to follow them (in destruction).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:18: This is how We sort out (the matter) with the evildoers.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:19: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:20: Did We not create you from (a drop) of detestable fluid?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:21: Then We placed it in a secure place (i.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:23: Then We determined time periods (for all the stages of growth from conception to birth).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:24: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:25: Have We not made the earth an assembling expanse,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:26: (That draws together) the living (as well as) the dead?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:27: And We placed on it soaring high and firm mountains, and gave you sweet water to drink (from springs of sweet, fresh water).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:28: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:29: (Now) move on to that (torment) which you used to deny.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:30: Proceed towards that shadow (of the smoke of Hell) that forks into three columns,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:31: A shadow which is neither cool nor protecting against the heat of Fire.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:32: Indeed, that (Hell) throws up sparks and flames (huge) as a lofty palace.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:33: (It also appears) as if those (sparks) are yellow camels.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:34: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:35: This is a Day (on which) they will not be able to speak too.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:36: Nor will they be allowed to offer any excuses.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:37: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:38: This is the Day of Judgment (on which) We shall gather you and (all) the earlier communities.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:39: Then if you have any scheme (and trick to escape from the torment), try (that) against Me.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:41: Surely, the Godfearing will be (rejoicing) under cool shades and amid springs.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:42: And whatever fruits they will long for (will be available for them).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:43: (It will be said to them:) ‘Enjoy eating and drinking to your taste as a reward for what you used to do.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:44: Indeed, the same way do We reward the pious.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:45: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:46: (O deniers of the truth!) Eat and enjoy yourselves for a short while.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:47: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:48: And when it is said to them: ‘Bow down (before Allah),’ they do not bow.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:49: Woe to the deniers on that Day!
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 77:50: Then in what revelation after this (Qur’an) will they believe? Day!

null.verse 77:1: Edellä käyneitten nimessä, jotka hyvää julistivat,
null.verse 77:2: niiden nimessä, jotka valhetta loitolle tunkivat,
null.verse 77:3: niiden, jotka (totuutta) ylt'ympäri kylvivät,
null.verse 77:4: joilla on (hyvän ja pahan) erottamisen kyky,
null.verse 77:6: joko selittäen tai varoittaen:
null.verse 77:7: Totisesti sen, mitä teille on ennustettu, täytyy tapahtua,
null.verse 77:10: kun vuoret raastetaan hajalle, tomuksi,
null.verse 77:11: ja kun sananjulistajien määräämä hetki saapuu
null.verse 77:12: miksi päiväksi on tuomio määrätty?
null.verse 77:14: Miten saada teidät ymmärtämään myös, mitä tuomion päivä sisältää?
null.verse 77:15: Voi tuona päivänä niitä, jotka hylkäsivät totuuden!
null.verse 77:16: Emmekö ole tuhonnut aikaisemminkin eläneitä sukupolvia?
null.verse 77:17: Ja sitten annoimme seuraavien sukupolvien astua heidän sijalleen.
null.verse 77:18: Näin menettelemme syyllisten suhteen.
null.verse 77:19: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka totuuden hylkäsivät!
null.verse 77:20: Emmekö luonut teitä mitättömästä pisarasta?
null.verse 77:21: Sen sijoitimme varmaan säilöön
null.verse 77:23: ja sitten kehitimme sitä sopusuhtaisesti.
null.verse 77:24: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka hylkivät totuutta!
null.verse 77:25: Emmekö ole luonut maan
null.verse 77:27: Emmekö ole maahan sijoittanut korkeita vuoria ja antanut teille raitista vettä juotavaksi?
null.verse 77:28: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka totuutta hylkivät!
null.verse 77:29: Käykää kohti sitä, jota väititte valheeksi,
null.verse 77:30: käykää kohti synkkää varjoa, joka ulottuu kolmeen suuntaan,
null.verse 77:31: joka ei vilvoita eikä torju tulen liekkejä!
null.verse 77:32: Nämä sinkoavat ylös torninkorkuisina,
null.verse 77:33: hohtavan keltaisina kuin kameelit.
null.verse 77:34: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka totuutta hylkivät!
null.verse 77:35: Tämä on päivä, jona heidän ei sallita puhua
null.verse 77:36: eikä esitellä anteeksipyyntöjä.
null.verse 77:37: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka totuutta hylkivät!
null.verse 77:38: Tämä on tuomion päivä.
null.verse 77:39: Jos viekkauteen pystytte, niin yrittäkää sitä Minua vastaan,
null.verse 77:40: sillä voi sinä päivänä totuuden väärentäjiä!
null.verse 77:41: Totisesti saavat ne, jotka pelkäävät Jumalaa, olla varjossa ja lähteitten äärillä
null.verse 77:42: sekä nauttia hedelmiä mielin määrin.
null.verse 77:43: »Syökää ja juokaa nautinnoksenne, palkaksi siitä, mitä olette tehneet!»
null.verse 77:44: Näin todenteolla palkitsemme niitä, jotka tekevät hyvää.
null.verse 77:45: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka sanoivat totuutta valheeksi!
null.verse 77:46: Syökää ja nauttikaa hetken aikaa, te syntiset!
null.verse 77:47: Voi tuona päivänä totuuden väärentäjiä!
null.verse 77:48: Ja kun heille sanotaan: »Kumartakaa!» niin he eivät kumarra.
null.verse 77:49: Voi sinä päivänä niitä, jotka totuutta hylkivät!
null.verse 77:50: Mihin sanomaan he tämän (Koraanin) jälkeen voivat uskoa?

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:7: ce qui vous est promis est inéluctable !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:10: lorsque les montagnes seront dispersées en poussière,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:11: lorsque les envoyés auront leur heure assignée.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:12: A quel jour cela sera-t-il reporté ? :
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:14: Mais qui te fera savoir ce qu'est le Jour de la Décision ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:15: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:16: N'avons-Nous pas fait périr les premiers hommes ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:17: Et ne leur avons-Nous pas donné les derniers comme successeurs ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:18: C'est ainsi que Nous agissons avec les coupables.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:19: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:20: Ne vous avons-Nous par créés d'un liquide vil
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:21: que Nous avons placé dans un réceptacle solide
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:23: Nous en avons décidé ainsi, en parfait Décideur !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:24: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:25: N'avons-Nous pas fait de la terre un lieu de réunion
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:26: pour les vivants et pour les morts ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:27: N'y avons-nous pas placé des cimes élevées et ne vous avons-Nous pas fait boire une eau douce ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:28: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:29: Allez rejoindre ce que vous traitiez de mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:30: Allez rejoindre l'ombre scindée en une triple colonne.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:31: Peu épaisse, elle n'est d'aucun secours contre la flamme.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:32: Celle-ci lance des étincelles grosses comme des tours
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:33: et semblables à des chameaux couleur de soufre.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:34: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:35: Ce sera le Jour où ils ne parleront pas,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:36: où il ne leur sera pas permis de présenter des excuses.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:37: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:38: Ce sera le Jour de la Décision.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:39: Si vous possédez un stratagème, utilisez-le contre Moi !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:40: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:41: En vérité, ceux qui craignent Dieu seront sous les ombrages et près des sources,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:43: " Mangez et buvez en paix, pour prix de vos oeuvres !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:44: C'est ainsi que Nous récompensons les hommes de bien ".
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:45: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:46: " Mangez et jouissez un peu de cette vie, vous, qui êtes coupables ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:47: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:48: Quand on leur dit : " Inclinez-vous ", ils ne s'inclinent pas !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:49: Malheur, ce Jour-là, à ceux qui crient au mensonge !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 77:50: A quel discours, après celui-ci, croiront-ils donc ? !

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:1: Par ceux qu’on envoie en rafales .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:3: Et qui dispersent largement [dans toutes les directions].
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:4: Par ceux qui séparent nettement (le bien et le mal) ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:7: Ce qui vous est promis est inéluctable.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:8: Quand donc les étoiles seront effacées,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:9: et que le ciel sera fendu,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:10: et que les montagnes seront pulvérisées,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:11: et que le moment (pour la réunion) des Messagers a été fixé ! .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:12: A quel jour tout cela a-t-il été renvoyé ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:14: Et qui te dira ce qu’est le Jour de la Décision ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:15: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:16: N’avons-Nous pas fait périr les premières
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:18: Puis ne les avons-Nous pas fait suivre par les derniers ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:19: C’est ainsi que Nous agissons avec les criminels.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:20: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:21: Ne vous avons-Nous pas créés d’une eau vile
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:22: que Nous avons placée dans un reposoir sûr, ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:24: Nous l’avons décrété ainsi et Nous décrétons
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:26: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:27: N’avons-Nous pas fait de la terre un endroit les contenant tous,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:28: les vivants ainsi que les morts ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:29: Et n’y avons-Nous pas placé fermement de hautes montagnes ? Et ne vous avons-Nous pas abreuvés d’eau douce ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:30: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:31: Allez vers ce que vous traitiez alors de mensonge !
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:32: Allez vers une ombre [fumée de l’Enfer] à trois branches;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:33: qui n’est ni ombreuse ni capable de protéger contre la flamme;
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:34: car [le feu] jette des étincelles volumineuses comme des châteaux,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:35: et qu’on prendrait pour des chameaux jaunes.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:36: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:37: Ce sera le jour où ils ne
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:39: et point ne leur sera donné permission de s’excuser.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:40: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:41: C’est le Jour de la Décision ,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:42: où nous vous réunirons ainsi que les anciens.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:43: Si vous disposez d’une ruse, rusez donc contre Moi.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:44: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:45: Les pieux seront parmi des ombrages et des sources.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:46: De même que des fruits selon leurs désirs.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:47: «Mangez et buvez agréablement, pour ce que vous faisiez».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:48: C’est ainsi que Nous récompensons les bienfaisants.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:49: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:50: «Mangez et jouissez un peu (ici-bas); vous êtes certes des criminels».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:51: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:52: Et quand on leur dit : «Inclinez-vous , ils ne s’inclinent pas.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:53: Malheur, ce jour-là, à ceux qui criaient au mensonge.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 77:54: Après cela, en quelle parole croiront-ils donc ? mensonge.

null.verse 77:1: Bei denen, die gute Gedanken in die Herzen senden,
null.verse 77:2: Und bei den stürmischen Wallungen, die stürmischen,
null.verse 77:3: Und bei den Kräften, die stets (die Wahrheit) verbreiten,
null.verse 77:4: Und dann zwischen (Gut und Böse) unterscheiden,
null.verse 77:5: Und dann die Ermahnung überall tragen,
null.verse 77:6: Zu entschuldigen oder zu warnen.
null.verse 77:7: Wahrlich, was euch verheißen ward, muß sich erfüllen.
null.verse 77:9: Und (die Pforten des) Himmels sich öffnen,
null.verse 77:10: Und wenn die Berge hinweggeblasen sind
null.verse 77:11: Und die Gesandten zu ihrer vorbestimmten Zeit gebracht werden -
null.verse 77:12: Für welchen Tag sind (diese Geschehnisse) aufgeschoben worden?
null.verse 77:14: Und wie kannst du wissen, was der Tag der Entscheidung ist! -
null.verse 77:15: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:16: Haben Wir nicht die Früheren vernichtet?
null.verse 77:17: Nun lassen Wir die Späteren ihnen folgen.
null.verse 77:18: So verfahren Wir mit den Schuldigen.
null.verse 77:19: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:20: Schufen Wir euch nicht aus einer verächtlichen Flüssigkeit,
null.verse 77:21: Die Wir an sichere Stätte brachten,
null.verse 77:23: So bemaßen Wir.
null.verse 77:24: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:25: Haben Wir die Erde nicht gemacht, zu halten
null.verse 77:27: Und Wir setzten in sie hohe Berge und gaben euch süßes Wasser zu trinken.
null.verse 77:28: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:29: «Gehet nun hin zu dem, was ihr nicht glaubtet.
null.verse 77:30: Gehet hin zu einem Schatten, der drei Wandlungen hat,
null.verse 77:31: Der keine Erleichterung bietet noch vor der Flamme schützt.
null.verse 77:32: Siehe, sie wirft Funken empor gleich Türmen,
null.verse 77:33: Als wären sie Kamele von hellgelber Farbe.
null.verse 77:34: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:35: Das ist ein Tag, da sie nicht (fähig sein werden zu) sprechen,
null.verse 77:36: Noch wird ihnen erlaubt sein, Entschuldigungen vorzubringen.
null.verse 77:37: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:38: «Dies ist der Tag der Entscheidung.
null.verse 77:39: Habt ihr nun eine List, so brauchet sie wider Mich.
null.verse 77:40: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:41: Die Gerechten werden inmitten von Schatten und Quellen sein,
null.verse 77:42: Und Früchten, wie sie sich wünschen.
null.verse 77:43: «Esset und trinkt in Gesundheit, um dessentwillen, was ihr getan.
null.verse 77:44: So fürwahr lohnen Wir denen, die Gutes tun.
null.verse 77:45: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:46: «Esset und ergötzt euch (auf Erden) eine kleine Weile.
null.verse 77:47: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:48: Und wenn zu ihnen gesprochen wird: «Beuget euch!», sie beugen sich nicht.
null.verse 77:49: Wehe an jenem Tag den Leugnern!
null.verse 77:50: An welches Wort, nach diesem, wollen sie denn glauben? Leugnern!
